caseStudies.title: NUTTER BUTTER, YOU GOOD?
caseStudies.subtitle: Absurdist Social Media Takeover
caseStudies.description: This 56-year-old cookie's rabbit hole of absurdist escapism consumed the internet.
caseStudies.storyText: While some brands on TikTok follow trends and hijack culture, Nutter Butter created culture through a nutty universe entirely of its own. We built a world where nothing seemed to make sense — by design.

challenge.title: GOING VIRAL WITHOUT MEDIA SPEND
challenge.description: By 2023, Nutter Butter hadn't advertised in over a decade. Sales were dwindling...

solution.title: COMMIT TO THE BIT
solution.description: Every TikTok took our fans deeper down our rabbit hole...

weirdSection.title: FEED THE WEIRD
weirdSection.description: Gen Z rewards brands that are self-aware, subversive and surreal...

caseStudies.title: ASUNWA
caseStudies.subtitle: Cultural Preservation Campaign
caseStudies.description: Stop the future from becoming a nation where everyone is named Sato.
caseStudies.storyText: A campaign to preserve cultural diversity in naming conventions for future generations.

challenge.title: PRESERVING CULTURAL IDENTITY
challenge.description: How do you make people care about a problem that won't affect them for generations?

solution.title: TIME TRAVEL STORYTELLING
solution.description: We created a future where everyone is named Sato, making the problem impossible to ignore.

weirdSection.title: THE SATO FUTURE
weirdSection.description: We visualized a dystopian future to spark conversation about cultural preservation today.

caseStudies.title: PRIME SODA – THE DRINK THAT DRANK THE INTERNET
caseStudies.subtitle: Influencer Brand Launch
caseStudies.description: What happens when a hydration drink becomes a cultural symbol? Chaos. Beautiful chaos.
caseStudies.storyText: PRIME wasn't just a drink — it became a flex. Kids collected flavors like NFT drops, stores rationed supply, and resale markets exploded.

challenge.title: TURNING HYPE INTO LONGEVITY
challenge.description: Hype dies. Culture doesn't. Our job was to turn internet noise into brand permanence.

solution.title: MAKE EVERY DROP A MOMENT
solution.description: We transformed flavor launches into cultural events using creator collabs, live TikTok drops, and social storytelling.

weirdSection.title: THE PRIME PARADOX
weirdSection.description: We leaned into the chaos of kids fighting over bottles, collectors trading flavors like crypto, and celebrities dueling on who endorsed it first.

caseStudies.title: LAGOS TRAFFIC MUSEUM – CHAOS TURNED CULTURE
caseStudies.subtitle: Experiential Installation
caseStudies.description: We turned Africa's most chaotic traffic system into an immersive cultural exhibition.
caseStudies.storyText: The Lagos Traffic Museum was a brand experience built from everyday chaos — honking, hawkers, danfo conductors, and unexplainable shortcuts.

challenge.title: TURNING A PROBLEM INTO PRIDE
challenge.description: Traffic is a national frustration. How do you convince people to celebrate it?

solution.title: MAKE IT ART
solution.description: We built an immersive installation where visitors could experience Lagos traffic as theatre, comedy, and culture.

weirdSection.title: THE DANFO DIMENSION
weirdSection.description: Visitors entered an AR-powered danfo simulation with flying hawkers, singing traffic wardens, and impossible traffic loops.

caseStudies.title: NEO BURGER — THE AI-GENERATED RESTAURANT
caseStudies.subtitle: AI-Powered Brand Experience
caseStudies.description: The world's first burger brand created entirely by artificial intelligence.
caseStudies.storyText: From recipes to restaurant design to ads — everything was generated by AI, curated by chefs and creators.

challenge.title: CAN AI BUILD A REAL BRAND?
challenge.description: Consumers trust food made by humans. Could we make them crave something engineered by algorithms?

solution.title: HUMAN + MACHINE CREATIVITY
solution.description: We blended AI imagination with real culinary craft to create flavors impossible to invent traditionally.

weirdSection.title: THE AI FLAVOR LAB
weirdSection.description: Menus changed in real time based on trending data, mood predictions, and weather patterns.
